name: Whiteout (Coming Soon)
description:
Game comes out May 2nd. 

You play as a secret service agent, you are sent out to investigate a private company that is off the grid, in the frigid Northern Canada. When things go wrong, you must adapt.

Warnings:
  • Game has imagery could be disturbing to certain people.
  • Game has claustrophobic spaces.
Controls:
  • WASD = Walk
  • CTRL = Crouch
  • SHIFT = Sprint
  • E = Interact
  • ESC = Quit
Known Bugs:
  • None
